This class represents the scrabble board.

ClientHandler
ClientHandler is responsible for listening for new messages coming in from the clients It maintains a reference to the PartyHost to notify it when messages are received.

TestBoard
This test class tests some of the methods that form the backbone of this program, run this class to get a short simulation of the game running, creating players, placing words on the board, getting the right scores, and updating players total score.
Tile
This class represents the tiles of the Scrabble game.

TileManager
 
TileScore
An enumeration of the values of the tiles in Scrabble.
TileTest
This test class tests some methods of tile, was initially designed to make sure tiles had the right values being set inside of them before testing other core components of the program
